album.strAlbum: Bloody Minded: The Best of Cock Sparrer
album.strDescriptionEN: Oi! and StreetRock bands come and go, one that's weathered the years and maintained their own sound and integrity is CockSparrer. Credited with bringing about the birth of Oi!, Sparrer did it first and best...tracks like "Where Are They Now" and "England Belongs to Me" rate as first-class among any punk, past or present. This is a fairly decent place to start if your a new fan, or, if you're like me, a good cd to play whenever vinyl isn't handy...Pick this up, and listen to part of history, then start a band and create your own history. Also, pick up "Shock Troops", possibly the greatest punk album EVER.
